title: Jockeys
credit_line: Acquired through the generosity of the Sarah Mellon Scaife Family
provenance_text:
Hilaire-Germain-Edgar Degas [1834-1917], until August 1886; purchased by Durand-Ruel, Paris, France, August 1886, stock no. Paris 851; Possibly William P. Moore by auction, New York, NY, May 1887; Possibly purchased by Charles Haviland, May 1887 [1]. Possibly Paul Durand-Ruel?, Paris, France, 1888. Wildenstein & Company, Inc. [1875-], New York, NY, by 1968; purchased by Museum, December 1968. 
NOTES:1. This ownership is in question-it could have been sold to Paul Durand-Ruel instead of Charles Haviland.

Updated by CGK
July 2012
